All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, org.apache.wicket.IClusterable, org.apache.wicket.IConverterLocator, org.apache.wicket.markup.html.IHeaderPartContainerProvider
public class EditUserPanel
extends org.apache.wicket.markup.html.panel.Panel

A panel for editing a user. TODO: Make this a little more AJAX Friendly for subclasses. TODO: This does not currently work with AJAX TODO: Can it ever work with AJAX? Must re-write databinder.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getSubmitComponent

protected org.apache.wicket.Component getSubmitComponent(String id)
Returns a link that will be used to submit the form. This can be overridden to use a button or other component. TODO: This "operation" thing is hidden and can cause confusion when subclasses override this method. Should just expect a single Component, which may be a panel/fragment.

Parameters:
id - The wicket ID for the component
Returns:
a Component, or null if there should be none.
